key_risks: Construction defects and litigation leading to financial losses and reputational damage

controversies: Multiple lawsuits alleging shoddy construction and safety concerns
Potential environmental risks from development in sensitive areas
environmental_issues: Potential pollution of local water supplies due to development in sensitive areas
social_issues: Impact of high mortgage rates on consumer demand and homebuyers
governance_issues: Litigation history and its impact on corporate reputation
